names.english: dredge the liver and scatter nodulation formula
names.commonEnglish: Dredge the Liver and Scatter Nodulation Formula

actions: Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, cools the Blood and reduces abscesses.
Clears Hot Phlegm and dissipates nodules.
With Xuan Shen, Kun Bu and Mu Li, for nodules due to Phlegm Fire.
with Chai Hu, for neck nodules due to Liver Qi Stagnation.
With Zhe Bei Mu, cools and relieves toxicity to disperse and transform Phlegm and treat goiter, scrofula and swollen or inflamed lymph glands.
With Xiang Fu and Chai Hu, for Liver Qi Stagnation.
Clears Heat, cools the Blood, nourishes Yin, softens hardness and dissipates nodules.
With Mu Li and Zhe Bei Mu, for scrofula, goiter, and other nodules due to Phlegm.
Calms the Liver, benefits Yin, anchors Floating Yang, softens hardness and dissipates nodules.
With Chai Hu, Dan Shen and chi Shao, for sub-costal pain and swelling.
Softens hardness and dissipates Phlegm nodules.
With Mu Li, Hai Zao, Kun Bu and Zhe Bei Mu, for scrofula and goiter from Phlegm-Heat.
Spreads Liver Qi, relieves Stagnation, disperses Wind-Heat and resolves Phlegm and congestion.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, relieves pain and reduces swelling from sores and abscesses.
Tonifies, invigorates and harmonizes the Blood, reduces swelling, expels pus, generates flesh and alleviates pain.
Invigorates the Blood, expels Blood Stasis and nourishes Liver and Kidney Yin.
Resolves Phlegm and softens Phlegm nodules.
With Hai Zao, for goiter and scrofula.
With Hai Zao, Xia Ku Zao, Xuan Shen and Zhe Bei Mu, for scrofula, goiter and other nodules.
Reduces Phlegm and softens areas of hardness.
Clears Heat, transforms Phlegm and dissipates nodules.
With Xuan Shen, Mu Li and Xia Ku Cao, for scrofula due to Phlegm-Fire with swelling and pain at multiple sites.
With Xuan Shen and Mu Li, for nodules without abscess.
Dredges the Liver
Regulates Qi
Transforms Phlegm
Scatters nodulation

symptoms: Urinary strangury and obstruction which is worse with emotional upset or stress

modifications.purpose: inhibited urination which is worse with stress or upset
